Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.lis.wingj.structure.geometry.Triangle

  • public class Triangle
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the definition of a triangle.
    Version:
    November 9, 2011
    Author:
    Ricard Delgado-Gonzalo (ricard.delg...@gmail.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getArea()
      This method returns the value of the area enclosed by the triangle.
      java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double getCentroid()
      This method returns the center of mass of the triangle.
      double getPerimeter()
      This method returns the perimeter of the triangle.
      double getVertexX(int vertexNum)
      This method returns the x coordinate of a certain vertex.
      double getVertexY(int vertexNum)
      This method returns the y coordinate of a certain vertex.
      boolean isClockwise()
      This method returns true if the vertices of the triangle are oriented clockwise, and false if the vertices of the triangle are oriented counterclockwise.
      void setVertex(int vertexNum, double x, double y)
      This method sets the coordinates of a certain vertex.
